articles.title: Alberta auto insurance reforms aim to reduce court battles over compensation

articles.title: EU says TikTok must disable ‘addictive’ features like infinite scroll, fix its recommendation engine
articles.description: The European Commission on Friday accused TikTok of purposefully designing its app to be "addictive," calling out features such as infinite scroll, autoplay, push notifications, and its recommendation engine.
